titles.title: I've Got Peace Like A River

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've got peace like a river. I've got peace like a river.
I've got peace like a river in my soul.
I've got peace like a river, I've got peace like a river
I've got peace like a river in my soul.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I've got joy like a fountain, etc.
I've got love like an ocean, etc.
I've got faith like a mountain, etc.
